title: Photo by Ohio police of adults who died of heroin with a child in the car
subtitle: In East Liverpool, Ohio, the police published a photo of two adults who had passed out in their car, who reportedly overgested heroin, with a child in the back seat.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A photo taken by a responding police officer shows a couple who fainted in their car from an overdose of suspected heroin, with their child in the back seat.
